definitions.definition: To, from or over a great distance in space, time or other extent.
examples: You have all come far and you will go further .
He built a time machine and travelled far into the future.
Over time, his views moved far away from mine.
You've gone far enough. Actually, a bit too far .

definitions.definition: Very much; by a great amount.
examples: He was far richer than we'd thought.
The expense far exceeds what I expected.
I saw a tiny figure far below me.

main_definition: To, from or over a great distance in space, time or other extent.
secondary_definitions: Very much; by a great amount.
